summary: Completed comprehensive testing of OTNT ERP MVP Week 1 - All core features working correctly including Auth, Admin Dashboard, Product Management, and Public Storefront
passed_tests: Backend API - All 24 endpoints tested successfully
User Authentication - Login/Register with admin@otnt.vn working
Admin Dashboard - Stats display and seed data function working
Product Management - CRUD operations for products, categories, brands
Public Storefront - Homepage, product catalog, product detail pages
Navigation - All admin and store navigation working
Search and Filters - Product search and filtering functional
Data Integration - Backend and frontend properly integrated

success_percentage.frontend: 95% (All major flows working, minor UI elements could be enhanced)
